summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 5173, entitled "An Ordinance prohibiting expectoration in public places and providing a penalty for the violation thereof", passed the City Council December 5, 1898; returned by the Mayor without his approval within ten days; became an Ordinance December 17, 1898, pursuant to Section 16 of Article 4 of the City Charter, and Ordinance No. 6677, approved April 2, 1901, amendatory thereof.
